about_the_game:
A trip not taken, a lie befallen - as you and your ward are both traumatized by a sudden change in your lives.

The story is about a man facing betrayal, but it's not just you, but also your daughter - whose image of this "Perfect Family" has been shattered within moments.

Xiomara

is an up-and-comer aspiring filmmaker who's climbing her way up through professional photography.
She has had a crush on you since who knows, but only recently has it changed something more, - much, much more...

Ava

is amongst the country's most well-known lawyers and has earned a lot of wealth but her profession has left her alone and constantly moving, but that's not the only reason she has been alone this whole time, but her feeling towards you too, which go back to both of your very humble beginnings and deep down, even she knows that the feelings are somewhat mutual.


And

You/(Alvaro)

are a middle-aged man with a good head on your shoulders, navigating life as it throws itself at you, especially when it comes to your daughter.

To be her King or to be her Prince.

Developer's Notes

Making Memories is a story and emotion first novel with focus on deep dive in their psyche, and while not an afterthought, the amount of purely carnal aspects of the genre was never my intention to explore in this novel - as other games have already done it, but it's fully there!
This is a Kinectic-ish Visual novel with branching events that tells you more about our characters, and the world they live in - this is just the beginning!

content_descriptors.notes: The story has the MC reevaluating his relationships with his family members and has depictions of consensual incest amongst themselves.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
